title: Easy chicken pie
ingredients: ['750g or 1/2 roast chicken (leftovers are ideal)', '25g butter', '4 to 5 spring onions, sliced', '2 teaspoons chopped tarragon', '2 teaspoons chopped chives', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '2 tablespoons cold water', '250ml milk', '150ml double cream', '250g button mushrooms', 'salt and pepper to taste', '500g puff pastry, ready rolled', '1 egg']
